alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Stoddard; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:14AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bollinger, southeastern Wayne and northwestern Stoddard Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1014 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shook, or 9 miles northeast of Lake Wappapello State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Puxico around 1025 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Advance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
